page.title: 12WOODMINTON HAMLET
page.content: WOODMINTON is a hamlet 1 mile from Bowerchalke centre. It is a hamlet of 18 households; 3 are farm tenants 15 are owner occupiers for under 10 yrs. There is a population of 10 children, 7 retired people (5 are widows) and 14 of working age., There are 2 farms - 1 beef rearing unit of 55 acres, and a horse breeding and arable farm of 223 acres. Six households have 1 CAR: seven have 2 cars, but no bus passes. One elderly widow occupied the larger farm, in the past, since coming from London as a young bride in 1930. Then she found no water or electricity laid on, but there was a combined general store and Post Office. There was also a shop selling homemade sweets. The nearest shop now is in Bowerchalke from which bread & grocer- ies may be delivered. Postbox at hand.
